name: Stranded Sun
description:
Welcome to the Moon! A beautiful place full of dust, abandoned installations and... monsters?!

You'll take the role of an astronaut on an exploration mission, whose only goal is to get back to the earth. However, an unexpected event will force him to get back to the dirty business that brews deep in the moon base...

This is a short game made for the #GodotWildJam 48, the theme was "Moon". We love the Moon, so we put literally our souls in this project. Maybe it was too ambitious for the time limit, but we love the game we referenced so the effort was not in vain.

We hope you enjoy playing as much as We did creating this game.

If you are participating in this jam too, We wish you luck!

Side note: The boss can't hit you, in the current jam build... Let's just say "it's not a bug, it's a feature" 😅 The whole game in general is kinda bugged, but we tried our best.
